alt_text: A bold teacher shirt with the phrase “Lick-Free Zone” in playful fonts, featuring a cartoon tongue crossed out. Designed to stop the germy chaos with humor and style. From EDUHaHa.
caption:
This shirt isn't for the kids... it's for your sanity. 😷🧼

The ‘Lick-Free Zone’ tee was made for the teachers who’ve seen it all — and smelled worse.

#EDUHaHa #TeacherHumor #ClassroomChaos

alt_text: Teacher t-shirt with zoo animals lined up in a school carpool lane, captioned ‘Meet the Parents.’ Funny, eye-catching design from EDUHaHa.
caption:
Every school has That Parent™.
This shirt has them all. 🐒🦁🦒

Perfect for carpool duty survivors and teacher lounge comedians.

alt_text: ‘Save Jimmy’ shirt showing a cartoon student stuck to a frozen pole — winter chaos meets classroom humor. From EDUHaHa.
caption:
We told him not to do it.
He did it anyway.
Now Jimmy's part of the playground.

The official cold-weather tee for teachers who supervise recess and rescue operations.
#SaveJimmy #teacherlife #recessduty
